name: Asif Uddin Khan
content: Asif Uddin Khan - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Asif Uddin Khan Asif Uddin Khan Asif Uddin Khan Assistant ProfessorReceived Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Utkal University, Bhubaneswar. Completed Ph.D. coursework from National Central University Taiwan, M.Tech in Computer Science & Engg from IIIT Bhubaneswar and B.Tech in Computer Science & Engg. from CV Raman College of Engineering Bhubaneswar. Presently working as a senior Asst Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University Bhubaneswar. My research interest includes designing improved models, frameworks and protocols for the modern networks and network based services to achieve guaranteed quality of service, improved quality of user experience and overall cost minimization. I am interested in emerging network technologies like vehicular ad-hoc networks, software defined networks, cloud computing, fog computing and edge computing. My current research focuses on Vehicular Fog Computing, Mobile Edge Computing and cloud-edge-fog (CEF) federation and IoT.
